__e: Last week, I told everyone you were my boyfriend not because you wanted me to, but because I wanted to.
It's like you want me to be like some dude who just doesn't give a shit.
And I meant what I said before, about being anybody that you need me to be.
I wasn't sure you still wanted to be with me like that.
I mean, people only do what they want to do, I mean... you wouldn't be here if you didn't really want to be, right?
I'm sure this is the last place in the world you wanted to be tonight.
We have been planning your wedding since you were a little girl, and now it's like you want nothing to do with me.
Bet you wish you had a couple of these out there Get all your buddies together.
Otherwise, we've got a problem, and I'm not the guy you want to have a problem with.
I could be the man if you want to be the girl.
I can't destroy all my work like that if you want to be my wife in free love, meaning, upon God and my conscience be.
Damn,blanquita. It's like you want to be a part of mi familia so bad.
I know, but if you ever just wanted to make money for yourself.
I've been thinking about what you said, and even if you didn't mean to be hurtful, it's all true.
I mean,it's not like you wouldn't do something for me that if the positions were reversed I would totally do for you, because that's what being brothers means.
You could be one of them, if you wanted to. But they could never be one of you.
No,I wanted you not to want the reward. $50,000 is a lot of money.
I know things don't look like the way you want them to, but your dad is trying, okay?
